name: Crazy Farming
description:
The most realistic 2D cartoon farming simulator arcade game available for your mobile device!

Help Billy-Bob turn his dump of a turkey farm into a success - and maybe even cheer up his grumpy old Mama along the way!

Everyone loves farming games, but boy are they packed with boring stuff. Plow the field. Boring. Plant some seeds. Yawn. Water them. Ho Hum. Watch them grow. Lame. Tired of waiting? Buy fertiliser. What?!? With real money, are you insane?

We hear you, and that's why we've created a whole new type of farming game - with no boring stuff! That's right, it's arcade action from the get-go with our hero Billy Bob and his trusty old axe. His farm is crawling with turkeys ready for market and it's up to you to give them the chop while keeping out of the manure.

If you like arcade games with tight controls, fun graphics, and wacky characters then this is the game for you!

WARNING: When playing this game you may find yourself

1. covered in manure
2. abused by an old lady (only verbally)
3. chopping thousands of turkeys
4. squeezing coins out of chickens

Also, if you want to buy your way onto the leaderboards, sorry, you can't. There are no in-app purchases.

If you like Crazy Farming be sure to check out our other games: Team Awesome, Diversion, Crazy Snowboard, Snow Spin, Halloweeen! and Zombie Jetpack
